0.6 (2010-07-30)
================

- Service name of the Windows service now consistent with the inner function
  get_service_name() in Zope2.Startup.zopectl.ZopeCmd.do_start(),
  that is "Zope19906508" instead of "Zope_19906508".
  [kleist]

- The Windows Service no longer starts Zope in debug mode.
  [kleist]
